title: GOMER MACFURI
author: GOMER MACFURI
content: I am an employee of nvidia, I have access to a corporate store with huge discounts for employees. I will send you the card by courier absolutely free and without any prepayment, you can unpack and check the video card in front of the courier, payment also to the courier by card or cash. What is my advantage? After receiving a video card you check its quality, making sure it is new and after all the tests have paid me a commission of 3% of the price. Request prices and ask any question tg https://t.me/Gomer_macfuri Tell you right away, we do not send to Russia.

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: You willing to use an escrow for this ? Sounding a bit too gooood to be true here man but if so then i'll take 200 3090Ti's and 100 3080TI

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: I am well known person here with very solid ratings.Pm me and I will talk a deal with you.
